name: [Mini Jam 101: Limit] Tower Drifter
description:
An entry for Mini Jam 101. Unfortunately, I ran out of time and couldn't finish it.

An original take on the theme (limit) was difficult for this one, because elements of tower defense introduce limits. I interpreted the additional limitation (which was control your environment) as being able to influence towers around you (within a limited range), possibly controlling them directly, but I had to cut down on the original vision.

Goal of the game

Kill 100 enemies before losing 100 lives. You lose lives when an enemy crosses the finish line (green zone).

Controls:

  • WSAD
  • U to upgrade towers (you must be near a tower to upgrade)
  • ESC or P to pause and/or restart
